spec_data.Name: lfc-server-mysql
spec_data.Description:
The LCG File Catalog (LFC) keeps track of the locations of the physical
replicas of the logical files in a distributed storage system.
This package provides an LFC server that uses MySQL as its database
back-end.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 04 Aug 2017 05:13:13 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: LCG File Catalog (LFC) server with MySQL database back-end
